text: Rising Damp is a British sitcom produced by Yorkshire Television for ITV. There were 28 thirty minute episodes in four series between 1974 and 1978. In 1980 it was followed by a movie of the same name. == Other websites == * * *Rising Damp at British TV Comedy Guide *Rising Damp at Oh..Miss Jones! title: Rising Damp
